title: Message to President Trejos Following the Eruption of a Volcano in Costa Rica.
text:
Dear Mr. President:

I was distressed to learn that a long dormant volcano has erupted in Costa Rica resulting in considerable loss of life, personal injury and material damage. I am asking our Embassy to work with you on emergency relief measures. Please let us know how we can be of help. Sincerely,

LYNDON B. JOHNSON
garbage_collected: [The Honorable Jose Joaquin Trejos Fernandez, President of Costa Rica]
